participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and creative, Emily enjoys engaging in hobbies that involve strategy and imagination.
participant_1.background: I enjoy playing Magic: the Gathering in my free time. I'm going to the park with my pug, Corky. I am not sure if my co-worker likes me, but I have a dog named Max. I drive a Subaru Outback because it is roomy for my quilting supplies and my mountain bike. I take pride in my appearance.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and artistic, Jordan expresses himself through various creative outlets and enjoys physical activities.
participant_2.background: I like to wear comfortable clothing when I play basketball. I'm a creative person who loves to express myself through music, drawing, and painting. I'm not in a relationship, but I'm content with my life. I work at a daycare. I am in school to be a computer engineer.

content.text: Great! I'm about to go play some basketball. What are you up to?
I'm going to the park with my pug, Corky. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I love all kinds of music, but I'm really into alternative rock right now. What's your favorite hobby?
I love to play Magic: the Gathering. It's a card game that's a lot of fun. Have you ever played?
No, I haven't. I'm more of a creative person. I love to paint, draw, and play music.
That's cool! I used to draw a lot when I was younger. Maybe we can paint together sometime.
That would be fun! I'm free on Saturday if you want to get together.
That sounds great! I'll text you my number
